page.title: 20Leisure in Bletchley
page.content: The most popular outdoor activities were gardening and walking.Many people also do horse riding,tennis and angling.Indoor activities are swimming at the Leisure Centres, sewing,knitting and reading. Weight training and Keep Fit sessions are done by many people. There are many organised sports clubs in Bletchley,particularly football,swimming and darts.Computer clubs and evening classes are also very popular. Many families belong to social clubs,where they have darts tournaments,discos and other entertainments. Most people were happy with the way they spent their leisure time but many said that the leisure centres where rather expensive for whole families to go to very often.
